mapper.sql: id, holding_id, filing_id, cik, company_name, name_of_issuer, cusip, value, shares, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO merge_holdings ( holding_id, filing_id, cik, company_name, name_of_issuer, cusip, value, shares ) VALUES
(#{item.holdingId}, #{item.filingId}, #{item.cik}, #{item.companyName}, #{item.nameOfIssuer}, #{item.cusip}, #{item.value}, #{item.shares})
mapper.select: select f.cik as cik, f.company_name as company_name, aggr.filing_id as filing_id, aggr.cusip as cusip, aggr.name_of_issuer as name_of_issuer, aggr.total_shares as total_shares, aggr.total_value as total_value, aggr.first_holding_id as first_holding_id from (SELECT h.filing_id, h.cusip, max(h.name_of_issuer) as name_of_issuer, SUM(h.value) as total_value, SUM(h.shares) as total_shares, COUNT(*) as holding_count, MIN(h.id) as first_holding_id FROM holdings h GROUP BY h.filing_id, h.cusip) aggr INNER JOIN filings f ON aggr.filing_id = f.id WHERE aggr.filing_id = #{filingId}
SELECT FROM merge_holdings WHERE filing_id = #{filingId} ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM merge_holdings WHERE filing_id = #{filingId}
